name: Samurai Sword Destiny™
description:
You control a deadly female samurai,
Akane, with a single goal in mind: to
find and bring her missing elder
brother home. On Akane’s quest, she
will encounter deadly ambushes,
storm enemy castle rooftops, and
square off against seemingly
indomitable opponents. With the help
of dozens of upgrades available to
enhance her fighting abilities, Akane
just might have a fighting chance
against the forces that stand in her
path!
